body.title: Using the SPFE Open Toolkit to create structured content
body.p: The SPFE Open Toolkit is system of XML tools for creating strongly-typed content for publication to the Web, to a screen, or in print. The toolkit implements the Synthesis, Presentation, Formatting, and Encoding (SPFE) Architecture for building structured authoring and publishing systems. The architecture simplifies the creation of typed content and is particularly well suited for creating content for the Web, where Every Page is Page One.
Find documentation here to help you to accomplish the following:

li.p: understand the concepts behind the SPFE Open Toolkit
install and operate the SPFE Open Toolkit to generate output in HTML and other formats
author structured content using the SPFE Open Toolkit.
